title: Blended Learning-Based Science Project: Enhancing Self-Regulated Learning Competencies through Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Concepts and Proficiency in Using Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Development of self-regulated learning strategies through project execution and learning analytics in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Through learning analytics, learners can identify at least three of their own learning patterns and develop improvement plans.
In a blended learning environment, learners can manage self-regulated learning records at least twice weekly using a smartphone-based LMS.
When conducting science projects, learners can achieve at least 80% completeness in final outputs by integrating peer feedback and learning analytics data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
